generated.title: GeneratedTotalCrossSection
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'TotalCrossSection'

description*.en: "Total Cross-section" is related to the absorbance of the light intensity through Beer-Lambert's law. It is the sum of all cross-sections corresponding to the various reactions or processes between an incident particle of specified type and energy and a target particle.

title: TotalCrossSection
description: "Total Cross-section" is related to the absorbance of the light intensity through Beer-Lambert's law. It is the sum of all cross-sections corresponding to the various reactions or processes between an incident particle of specified type and energy and a target particle.
